pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 29, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Environment and Climate Change Catherine McKenna, will tour the Anthropocene art exhibition, joined by the artists Edward Burtynsky, Jennifer Baichwal, and Nicholas de Pencier. The Prime Minister will then deliver remarks and hold a Q&A session with students from Coll√®ge catholique Samuel-Genest.

National Gallery of Canada
380 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for the tour
    • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
    • Media should present themselves to the group entrance no later than 10:30 a.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
